Title: Nice for the price
Cons: The battery door was designed by evil scientists,waaay too hard to open....
Pros: Nice sized camera,not too small,great for folks with larger hands.Good weight,feels like a high quality piece.Easy to see screen,clear and readable even outdoors,GREAT pics.Even has decent video!Better than average battery life(average 150 pics with rechargeables-2700mah)  All in all,a great camera.
Comments: Although I didnt buy it here(it was a gift),it exceded all of my expectations.A fine,fine camera for the coin spent.

Title: hell yeah
Cons:
picture quality isnt like a d-slr like i wish i had.. 

didnt come with a screen cover thing so it doesnt get all scratched and smudged
Pros: in my mind this camera looks awesome.  i got it to replace my old powershot a410.  it takes good pictures for how cheap it was
Comments: i wish i wasnt clumsy cause i know ill end up dropping this thing anywhere from cement to snow

Title: Sweet Little Camera
Cons: Well one con, the compartment for batteries and chip kind of difficult to open.
Pros: Sweet Camera, with very easy instructions. No problems at all.

Title: Great Camera
Pros: Absurd battery life, fast pictures, easy to hold, easy to use.
Comments: I got this for my girlfriend, and she used it for two months and took over 400 pictures before replacing the NiMH batteries.  Best gift I've ever gotten her, she absolutely loves it.

Title: cannon powershot entry model  a470 winner !
Cons: don't like battery door lil trouble w/t opening.
Pros: take very nice pictures indoors, outdoors next ..SPRING ! pictures are as good as in lcd displayed good flash for indoors
Comments: overall nice first cannon cam. but then again  new a580 is only 30.00 bucks more .. bought both cam. and very happy with both cannon and newegg fast shipping !
